overview: Life is full of risks. Countless decisions are made every day. And regardless of whether the decision was well thought out or impulsive, for some people it's either the jackpot or a disaster. Like a game of chance, life makes a winner or a loser out of each individual ... depending on how the dice fall. And yet, or perhaps because of this, in "Roll The Dice" the writer Charles Bukowski encourages people to take risks - with all their consequences.
title: Roll The Dice
